title: Calculate Annual CAM Reconciliation
description: A property manager for a retail center must reconcile the annual Common Area Maintenance (CAM) expenses and bill or credit tenants.

tasks.description: Compile all CAM-related operating expenses for the property for the previous year (e.g., landscaping, security, parking lot maintenance).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a total figure for all actual CAM expenses.

tasks.description: For each tenant, calculate their pro-rata share of the actual expenses based on their leased square footage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exact CAM amount owed by each tenant is calculated.

tasks.description: Compare the actual amount owed with the estimated CAM payments made by each tenant during the year and issue a bill for any shortfall or a credit for any overpayment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Reconciliation letters and invoices/credits are sent to all tenants.
